channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: This 2-in-1 gaming laptop might not have the best performance-to-price ratio, but it delivers a thinner, lighter, quieter, and cooler experience than ...

item.title: Take the stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Apply to speak now

item.title: Google fixes two Android zero-day bugs actively exploited by hackers
item.description: The most severe security bug can be exploited without user interaction, per Google.

item.title: A nonprofit is using AI agents to raise money for charity
item.description: Tech giants like Microsoft might be touting AI “agents” as profit-boosting tools for corporations, but a nonprofit is trying to prove that agents can ...

item.title: How to Choose the Right Soundbar (2025): Size, Price, Surround Sound, and Subwoofers
item.description: What size should you get? Do you need a subwoofer? Here’s everything you need to know when upgrading your TV’s audio.

item.title: Tariffs Will Make Electronics More Expensive. If You Need a New Gadget, ‘Buy It Now’
item.description: A 54 percent tariff on imports from China will likely see rising prices on smartphones and laptops in the coming months.

item.title: Renoun Endurance 88 Skis Review: Switch Between Soft and Stiff
item.description: A proprietary polymer lets these skis switch between soft and stiff to help keep your legs fresh on the hill.

item.title: Ooni Halo Pro Spiral Mixer Review: Dough as Far as the Eye Can See
item.description: Upgrade your summer hosting game with Ooni’s commercial-inspired spiral dough mixer.

item.title: Does Colossal Biosciences’ dire wolf creation justify its $10B+ valuation?
